Package model.rsa

Class Algorithm

java.lang.Object
model.rsa.Algorithm
public class Algorithm
extends java.lang.Object
Class allows to encrypt and decrypt data by using instances of Cipher class. To convert Public and Private key from string to binary representation (and vice versa), text is encoded and decoded using Base64 encoding. Because of the padding, 2048 bit keys size and model.rsa algorithm nature, maximum length of unprocessed text can be 190 characters. Any message longer than that will be automatically shortened to 190 characters if "Encrypt" radio button is selected when pressing "Process" button. There is no limit when "Decrypt" radio button is selected, each encrypted message will be longer than before mentioned limit.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Michal Szeler

    Constructors

    Algorithm()
    Constructor with no parameters, no fields are initialized

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String decrypt​(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String PrivateKey)
    Method decrypts data by using an instance of Cipher class, OAEP with SHA-256 and MGF1 padding and Base64 decoding
    java.lang.String encrypt​(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String publicKey)
    Method encrypts data by using an instance of Cipher class, OAEP with SHA-256 and MGF1 padding and Base64 encoding
    private java.security.PrivateKey getPrivateKey​(java.lang.String base64PrivateKey)
    Method converts model.rsa Private Key from String to PublicKey format using PKCS #8 encoding and instance of KeyFactory class
    private java.security.PublicKey getPublicKey​(java.lang.String base64PublicKey)
    Method converts model.rsa Public Key from String to PublicKey format using X.509 encoding and instance of KeyFactory class

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Algorithm

      public Algorithm()
      Constructor with no parameters, no fields are initialized

  • Method Details

    • getPublicKey

      private java.security.PublicKey getPublicKey​(java.lang.String base64PublicKey) throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException, java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
      Method converts model.rsa Public Key from String to PublicKey format using X.509 encoding and instance of KeyFactory class
      Parameters:
      base64PublicKey - String encoded in Base64 format which represents the value of model.rsa Public Key
      Returns:
      An instance of PublicKey class which was created from base64PublicKey parameter
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - KeyFactory was unable to get an instance of model.rsa algorithm
      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - base64PublicKey specification is incorrect

    • getPrivateKey

      private java.security.PrivateKey getPrivateKey​(java.lang.String base64PrivateKey) throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException, java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
      Method converts model.rsa Private Key from String to PublicKey format using PKCS #8 encoding and instance of KeyFactory class
      Parameters:
      base64PrivateKey - String encoded in Base64 format which represents the value of model.rsa Private Key
      Returns:
      An instance of PrivateKey class which was created from base64PrivateKey parameter
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - KeyFactory was unable to get an instance of model.rsa algorithm
      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - base64PrivateKey specification is incorrect

    • encrypt

      public final java.lang.String encrypt​(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String publicKey) throws javax.crypto.BadPaddingException, javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException, javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException, java.security.InvalidKeyException, java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Method encrypts data by using an instance of Cipher class, OAEP with SHA-256 and MGF1 padding and Base64 encoding
      Parameters:
      data - Text that contains message to encrypt
      publicKey - Text that contains model.rsa Public Key (encoded in Base64 format by default)
      Returns:
      Text that contains an encrypted message
      Throws:
      javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - Data is padded inappropriately, eg. with different padding
      javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - Algorithm couldn't find appropriate padding
      javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - Data parameter is too long
      java.security.InvalidKeyException - publicKey parameter is incorrect
      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - publicKey parameter specification is incorrect
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Algorithm couldn't get an instance of model.rsa algorithm

    • decrypt

      public final java.lang.String decrypt​(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String PrivateKey) throws javax.crypto.BadPaddingException, javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException, javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException, java.security.InvalidKeyException, java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Method decrypts data by using an instance of Cipher class, OAEP with SHA-256 and MGF1 padding and Base64 decoding
      Parameters:
      data - Text that contains message to decrypt
      PrivateKey - Text that contains model.rsa Public Key (encoded in Base64 format by default)
      Returns:
      Text that contains a decrypted message
      Throws:
      javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - Data is padded inappropriately, eg. with different padding
      javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - Algorithm couldn't find appropriate padding
      javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - Data parameter is too long
      java.security.InvalidKeyException - publicKey parameter is incorrect
      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - publicKey parameter specification is incorrect
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Algorithm couldn't get an instance of model.rsa algorithm
